head.title: Complementary tools

body:
#Complementary tools

A list of complementary tools built and maintained by the community.

#Analysis platform engines

  • codeclimate-stylelint: Code Climate engine for stylelint

#Autocorrect

  • stylefmt: Automatically formats CSS and SCSS source code based on your stylelint configuration.

#Build tool plugins

  • broccoli-stylelint: A Broccoli plugin for stylelint.
  • ember-cli-stylelint: A Ember CLI plugin for stylelint.
  • grunt-stylelint: A Grunt plugin for stylelint.
  • gulp-stylelint: A gulp plugin for stylelint.
  • stylelint-webpack-plugin: A webpack plugin for stylelint.

#Editor plugins

  • linter-stylelint: An Atom plugin for stylelint.
  • SublimeLinter-contrib-stylelint: A Sublime Text plugin for stylelint.
  • vscode-stylelint: A Visual Studio Code extension for stylelint.

#Editors

  • WebStorm: Version 2016.3 onwards has built-in support for stylelint.
